name: provider
description: Infrastructure provider: gcp_gpu, gcp_tpu, aws_gpu, aws_inf, aws_trn, azure_gpu, self_hosted.

name: pricing_id
description: Normalized unique pricing identifier. Issue #47: Composite key alternative to (instance_type + gpu_type + region). Format: {provider}_{instance_type}_{gpu_type}_{region}. Use this for API lookups and overrides.

name: resource_type
description: Resource type: gpu, tpu, inferentia, trainium.

name: instance_type
description: Instance type. Example: a2-highgpu-1g, p4d.24xlarge. Issue #47: Part of composite key (instance_type + gpu_type + region).

name: gpu_type
description: GPU/accelerator type. Example: A100-40GB, H100-80GB, TPU-v5e. Issue #47: Part of composite key (instance_type + gpu_type + region).

name: region
description: Cloud region. Example: us-central1, us-east-1, eastus. Issue #47: Part of composite key (instance_type + gpu_type + region).

name: cloud_provider
description: Cloud platform: gcp, aws, azure, local.

name: is_override
description: True if org has custom pricing.

name: override_hourly_rate
description: Org-specific hourly rate override. Issue #45: Standardized override naming.

name: override_effective_from
description: When override pricing became effective. Issue #45: Added for consistency with PAYG.

name: x_pipeline_id
description: Pipeline that loaded this pricing data.

name: x_ingested_at
description: When pricing was written to table.
